body.p: Notepad++ is an enhanced text editor that can be used for editing source codes. Unlike the regular notepad, it provides an ideal environment for programmers that supports many programming languages and file formats. Its workspace is highly configurable that can be adjusted to suit the working style and needs of the user.

Developed in C++ language, Notepad++ incorporates the powerful editing component Scintilla. Its execution speed is high owing to the use of Win32 API and STL, which also offer the advantage of less program space. Notepad++ is user friendly as well as environment friendly. It is light on the CPU and consumes less power, thus resulting in less CO2 footprint.
